All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddArrowListener
AddArrowListener is a GraphActionListener responsible for handling arrow creation for the graph.
AddChargeListener
AddChargeListener is an GraphActionListener responsible for handling adding charges to the graph.
AddPotentiometerListener
AddPotentiometerListener is a GraphActionListener responsible for handling potentiometer tool creation for the graph.
Arrow2D
The Arrow class is used to represent 2D vector values with a position on a graph.
ArrowLayoutListener
The ArrowLayoutListener is a GraphActionListener responsible for handling field arrow creation and patterning.
ArrowPatterns
ArrowPatterns is a utility class used to generate various patterns of FieldArrows for a graph object.
ArrowView
The FieldArrowView class is an ElementView responsible for drawing all FieldArrows on a graph using a provided Graphics object.
Bound
Bound is used to define the interaction bounding-box of a given object.
Charge
Data representation of an electric charge.
ChargeEditorFrame
The ChargeEditorFrame is a subclass of JFrame used to gather user inputs for editing or creating Charge objects.
ChargeGraph2D
The ChargeGraph2D class extends the functionality of Graph2D to manage a list of charges on a graph.
ChargeGraphView
The ChargeGraphView class is used to draw and maintain a view model for the ChargeGraph2D class.
ChargeSimulation
This class is solely responsible for running the program.
ChargeView
The ChargeView class is an ElementView responsible for drawing all Charges on a graph using a provided Graphics object.
DeleteElementAction
The DeleteElementAction class is a GraphAction used to delete a graph element under the mouse when the user enters the bound input.
DraggableFieldArrow
The DraggableFieldArrow class is a specific type of Arrow2D used to represent field vectors on a graph.
EditChargeListener
The ChargeEditListener is a GraphMouseListener responsible for handling charge edit inputs on a graph.
ElementDragListener
The ElementDragListener is a GraphMouseListener responsible for handling element drag inputs on a graph.
ElementView<T extends IGraphElement>
Subclasses of ElementView allow a given IGraphElementType to be displayed on a Graph.
FieldArrow
The FieldArrow class is a specific type of Arrow2D used to represent field vectors on a graph.
FileOpenListener
FileOpenListener is a GraphActionListener responsible for handling loading files into the program.
FileSaveListener
FileSaveListener is a GraphActionListener responsible for handling saving files to the system from the program.
Graph2D
The Graph class is used to store and manage a list of IGraphElements.
GraphAction
The GraphAction class acts as a parent class to all Actions that require a ChargeGraph2D to perform their task.
GraphActionListener
GraphActionListener is used to relate similar ActionListener subclasses that manage inputs on a ChargeGraph2D.
GraphFileFormatException
GraphFileFormatException serves as a generic exception type for all formatting issues regarding Graph2D file input and output.
GraphicsUtils
The GraphicsUtils class contains a variety of helper functions for drawing images.
GraphIO
The GraphIO class is used to write Graph2D data to a text file.
GraphMouseListener
GraphMouseListener is used to relate similar MouseListener subclasses that manage inputs on a ChargeGraph2D.
HelpPanelListener
HelpPanelListener is an ActionListener responsible for displaying the help menu.
IGraphElement
IGraphElement provides an interface for all elements that may be part of a Graph.
OffsetRectangleBound
OffsetRectangleBound is a subclass of RectangleBound that applies an x and y offset to the boundary.
PotentiometerGraphTool
PotentiometerGraphTool is used to represent a potentiometer instance on a Graph2D.
PotentiometerView
The PotentiometerView class is an ElementView responsible for drawing all PotentiometerGraphTools on a graph using a provided Graphics object.
ProgramAssets
The ProgramAssets class is responsible for loading all image assets built into the program.
ProgramController
ProgramController serves as a link between the model and view objects for the Charge Simulation program.
ProgramView
The ProgramView class is responsible for managing all view components of the program.
RectangleBound
RectangleBound is a subclass of Bound used to define rectangular boundary boxes.
ToolbarView
ToolbarView is a subclass of JPanel used by the program view to display various program options to the user.
ToolboxView
ToolboxView is a subclass of JPanel used by the program view to display various IGraphElement creation options to the user.
Vec2D
The Vec2D class is used to represent 2D vector values.
Vec2DTestCases
Vec2DTestCases is used to test the Vec2D implementation.
